meta.title: LocalScraper - Extract Local Business Data Instantly
meta.description: The ultimate tool for scraping local business data. Select a zone on the map, retrieve contact information, and export to CSV or Google Sheets. Perfect for lead generation, market research, and business intelligence.
meta.keywords: business scraper, local business data, lead generation, business intelligence, market research, OpenStreetMap, data extraction, business contacts, CSV export

step1.title: 1. Search or Select a Zone
step1.description: Use our intelligent search to find a city or area, or draw a rectangle directly on the interactive map to define your target zone.

step2.title: 2. Automatic Data Extraction
step2.description: Our engine instantly extracts all local business data from the selected area, including names, addresses, phone numbers, and websites.

step3.title: 3. Export and Use
step3.description: Download your data in CSV format or copy it directly to Google Sheets for immediate use in your CRM or marketing campaigns.

leadGeneration.title: Lead Generation
leadGeneration.description: Find and contact local businesses for B2B sales. Perfect for sales teams looking to expand their customer base in specific geographic areas.

marketResearch.title: Market Research
marketResearch.description: Analyze the competitive landscape and identify market opportunities. Get a complete view of businesses in any area for strategic decision-making.

deliveryServices.title: Delivery & Services
deliveryServices.description: Build a database of restaurants, stores, and local services for delivery platforms or partnership programs.

speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.description: Get thousands of business records in seconds, not hours

accuracy.title: Accurate Data
accuracy.description: Powered by OpenStreetMap's reliable and up-to-date database

privacy.title: Privacy-Focused
privacy.description: No personal data storage, all processing happens in real-time

easy.title: User-Friendly
easy.description: Intuitive interface that anyone can use without technical knowledge

q1.question: What data can I extract?
q1.answer: LocalScraper extracts business names, full addresses, phone numbers, websites, and geographic coordinates. All data comes from OpenStreetMap's public database.

q2.question: Is it legal?
q2.answer: Yes, absolutely. We only extract publicly available data from OpenStreetMap, which is an open-source collaborative project. All data is licensed under ODbL (Open Database License).

q3.question: How many businesses can I extract?
q3.answer: There's no hard limit. You can extract as many businesses as exist in your selected zone. For very large areas, we automatically split the extraction into smaller chunks for optimal performance.

q4.question: What export formats are available?
q4.answer: You can export data to CSV format or copy it directly to paste into Google Sheets, Excel, or any spreadsheet application.
